name: Deranged
description:
In this intriguing story you will play the role of Meredith, the new tenant of the O'Connor mansion, a famous house rumored many centuries ago to have housed local witches, who were eventually captured and sentenced to death in the town square. To date there are only stories about a supposed curse, but in the end they are just that, stories ... or not?

  • Immersive experience: [/] Thanks to the realistic graphics and sounds that 'Deranged' is composed of, as a player you will achieve a terrifying and immersive experience.

  • Voice recognition: [/] Be careful when you get scared! Do not yell more than you should, because if you do, you will attract your nightmares.

  • Puzzles: [/] Unlike most horror games, here there is a real challenge when solving the puzzles, since they really require a real mental effort to solve them.

  • Horror and entertainment: [/] This video game contains a completely deep and intriguing story, as well as mechanics, puzzles and ways to horrify never before seen, so this set of abilities offers you many hours of fear and fun guaranteed! .
